nodes.text: Old Warris was a Human male villager and member of the Myyydril tribe. He lived in the Myyydril Caverns along with the rest of his tribe, within the Kkowir Forest on the Wookiee homeworld of Kashyyyk during the Galactic Civil War in 1 ABY.

Old Warris appeared as a non-player character in Rage of the Wookiees, an expansion for the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
